title: I drew some pictures.
body:
I drew a picture of Gangplank in honour of his death.

EDIT: I also drew one of Fizz because he is cool as hell.

EDIT 2: Mundo has an 8-pack, renekton has eyes.

replies.body: These paintings are heathen, they must burrrrn!!

Renekton is green, Fizzs' are blue,
If some people like Gangplank, I like them too.
I got up at 2 in the morning to show you guys the new two.
